name: chocolatey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the smell, taste, or colour of chocolate: The sauce itself was like chocolatey toffee. The brownies were moist and chocolaty.
having a deep, rich, smooth sound: He has a fantastic voice that can range from a fragile falsetto to a deep, chocolatey drawl. She demonstrates how to get a sound out of the violin that she describes as "chocolaty".
More examplesFewer examplesThis will give the cake a more chocolatey flavour than ordinary cocoa.The muffins had soft, chocolatey insides.The cookies were soft and sweet while still having a chocolaty taste. The cake was chocolaty, but not too sweet.
